snippet: “I failed to raise her properly,” said Cho Yang-ho, chairman of Korean Air Lines, apologizing on live television as a furor over the serving of macadamia nuts continued on Friday.
abstract: Cho Yang-ho, chairman of Korean Air Lines, strips his daughter Cho Hyun-ah of all titles she held in family conglomerate; he also apologizes on South Korean television for her behavior in throwing tantrum over bag of nuts served to her on an airplane; she promises to apologize to airline crew for her behavior.
lead_paragraph: “I failed to raise her properly,” said Cho Yang-ho, chairman of Korean Air Lines, apologizing on live television as a furor over the serving of macadamia nuts continued on Friday.

headline.main: Korean Air Chairman Strips Daughter’s Titles After Her ‘Foolish’ Behavior
headline.print_headline: Korean Air Chairman Strips Daughter’s Titles After Her ‘Foolish’ Behavior
